title: Ha Noi Le Grand Hotel
information: Ha Noi Le Grand Hotel is located at 3 B9 Dam Trau, Bach Dang Ward, Hai Ba Trung District, Hanoi, Vietnam. It is highly recommended for various travelers including backpackers, couples, families, and business guests, offering an affordable yet comfortable stay with decent facilities and great services. The hotel provides a 24-hour front desk and WiFi in public areas. It is situated near a shopping area and attractions like Lake of the Restored Sword (2.32 km) and St. Joseph's Cathedral (2.54 km).
